queryMap.query: SELECT /* tbed_print_fd001 */ A.DAY_ORD||'일차' GBN --일차 ,A.RACE_CNT CNT --경주수 ,A.CNT110+A.CNT120+A.CNT995+A.CNT997+A.CNT996+A.CNT125+A.CNT140+A.CNT999+A.CNT150+A.CNT210+A.CNT220 SUM --총계 ,A.CNT110 CNT110 --F ,A.CNT120 CNT120 --L ,A.CNT995 CNT995 --출주제외(I) ,A.CNT997 CNT997 --출주제외(II) ,A.CNT996 CNT996 --출주제외면책 ,A.CNT125 CNT125 --반칙실격 ,A.CNT140 CNT140 --실격 ,A.CNT999 CNT999 --실격면책 ,A.CNT150 CNT150 --반칙경고 ,A.CNT210 CNT210 --경고 ,A.CNT220 CNT220 --주의 FROM ( SELECT B.DAY_ORD DAY_ORD ,COUNT(DISTINCT B.RACE_NO) RACE_CNT ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '110', A.RACE_NO)) CNT110 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '120', A.RACE_NO)) CNT120 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '995', A.RACE_NO)) CNT995 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '997', A.RACE_NO)) CNT997 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '996', A.RACE_NO)) CNT996 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '125', A.RACE_NO)) CNT125 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '140', A.RACE_NO)) CNT140 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '999', A.RACE_NO)) CNT999 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '150', A.RACE_NO)) CNT150 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '210', A.RACE_NO)) CNT210 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '220', A.RACE_NO)) CNT220 FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT A ,TBEB_RACE B WHERE A.STND_YEAR(+) = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MBR_CD(+) = B.MBR_CD AND A.TMS(+) = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD(+) = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO(+) = B.RACE_NO AND B.STND_YEAR = ? AND B.MBR_CD = ? AND B.TMS = ? GROUP BY B.DAY_ORD ORDER BY B.DAY_ORD ) A

SELECT A.RACER_GRD_CD GBN --등급 ,A.RACER_CNT CNT --선수수 ,A.CNT110 CNT110 --F ,A.CNT120 CNT120 --L ,A.CNT995 CNT995 --출주제외(I) ,A.CNT997 CNT997 --출주제외(II) ,A.CNT996 CNT996 --출주제외면책 ,A.CNT125 CNT125 --반칙실격 ,A.CNT140 CNT140 --실격 ,A.CNT999 CNT999 --실격면책 ,A.CNT150 CNT150 --반칙경고 ,A.CNT210 CNT210 --경고 ,A.CNT220 CNT220 --주의 ,A.CNT110+A.CNT120+A.CNT995+A.CNT997+A.CNT996+A.CNT125+A.CNT140+A.CNT999+A.CNT150+A.CNT210+A.CNT220 SUM --총계 FROM ( SELECT B.RACER_GRD_CD RACER_GRD_CD ,COUNT(DISTINCT B.RACER_NO) RACER_CNT ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '110', A.RACE_NO)) CNT110 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '120', A.RACE_NO)) CNT120 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '995', A.RACE_NO)) CNT995 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '997', A.RACE_NO)) CNT997 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '996', A.RACE_NO)) CNT996 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '125', A.RACE_NO)) CNT125 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '140', A.RACE_NO)) CNT140 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '999', A.RACE_NO)) CNT999 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '150', A.RACE_NO)) CNT150 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '210', A.RACE_NO)) CNT210 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '220', A.RACE_NO)) CNT220 FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT A ,TBEB_ORGAN B WHERE A.STND_YEAR(+) = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MBR_CD(+) = B.MBR_CD AND A.TMS(+) = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD(+) = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO(+) = B.RACE_NO AND A.RACE_REG_NO(+)= B.RACE_REG_NO AND B.STND_YEAR = ? AND B.MBR_CD = ? AND B.TMS = ? GROUP BY B.RACER_GRD_CD ORDER BY B.RACER_GRD_CD ) A

SELECT A.VOIL_JO||'조' GBN --위반조항 ,0 CNT -- ,A.CNT110 CNT110 --F ,A.CNT120 CNT120 --L ,A.CNT995 CNT995 --출주제외(I) ,A.CNT997 CNT997 --출주제외(II) ,A.CNT996 CNT996 --출주제외면책 ,A.CNT125 CNT125 --반칙실격 ,A.CNT140 CNT140 --실격 ,A.CNT999 CNT999 --실격면책 ,A.CNT150 CNT150 --반칙경고 ,A.CNT210 CNT210 --경고 ,A.CNT220 CNT220 --주의 ,A.CNT110+A.CNT120+A.CNT995+A.CNT997+A.CNT996+A.CNT125+A.CNT140+A.CNT999+A.CNT150+A.CNT210+A.CNT220 SUM --총계 FROM ( SELECT A.VOIL_JO VOIL_JO ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '110', A.RACE_NO)) CNT110 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '120', A.RACE_NO)) CNT120 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '995', A.RACE_NO)) CNT995 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '997', A.RACE_NO)) CNT997 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '996', A.RACE_NO)) CNT996 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '125', A.RACE_NO)) CNT125 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '140', A.RACE_NO)) CNT140 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '999', A.RACE_NO)) CNT999 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '150', A.RACE_NO)) CNT150 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '210', A.RACE_NO)) CNT210 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.VOIL_CD, '220', A.RACE_NO)) CNT220 FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT A WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? GROUP BY A.VOIL_JO ORDER BY A.VOIL_JO ) A

SELECT /* tbed_print_fd004 IWORK_SFR-008 3일차 까지... */ A.ACDNT_LOC_CD LOC_CD ,B.CD_NM LOC_NM ,COUNT(A.RACE_NO) SUM ,COUNT(DECODE(A.DAY_ORD, 1, A.RACE_NO)) CNT_1 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.DAY_ORD, 2, A.RACE_NO)) CNT_2 ,COUNT(DECODE(A.DAY_ORD, 3, A.RACE_NO)) CNT_3 FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT A ,TBEA_SPEC_CD B WHERE A.ACDNT_LOC_CD = B.CD AND B.GRP_CD = 'E00034' AND A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? GROUP BY A.ACDNT_LOC_CD,B.CD_NM ORDER BY A.ACDNT_LOC_CD,B.CD_NM

SELECT A.ACDNT_TPE_CD TPE_CD ,B.CD_NM TPE_NM ,COUNT(A.RACE_NO) CNT ,'' RMK FROM TBED_RACE_ACDNT_STTS A , TBEA_SPEC_CD B WHERE A.ACDNT_TPE_CD = B.CD AND B.GRP_CD = 'E00062' AND A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? GROUP BY A.ACDNT_TPE_CD,B.CD_NM ORDER BY A.ACDNT_TPE_CD,B.CD_NM

SELECT /* tbed_print_fd006 IWORK_SFR-008 8코스 까지... */ GBN ,COURSE_1 ,COURSE_2 ,COURSE_3 ,COURSE_4 ,COURSE_5 ,COURSE_6 ,COURSE_7 ,COURSE_8 FROM ( SELECT 1 SEQ ,A.DAY_ORD||'일차' GBN ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 1, 1, 0)) COURSE_1 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 2, 1, 0)) COURSE_2 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 3, 1, 0)) COURSE_3 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 4, 1, 0)) COURSE_4 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 5, 1, 0)) COURSE_5 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 6, 1, 0)) COURSE_6 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 7, 1, 0)) COURSE_7 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 8, 1, 0)) COURSE_8 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.RANK = 1 GROUP BY A.DAY_ORD UNION ALL SELECT 2 SEQ ,'계' GBN ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 1, 1, 0)) COURSE_1 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 2, 1, 0)) COURSE_2 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 3, 1, 0)) COURSE_3 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 4, 1, 0)) COURSE_4 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 5, 1, 0)) COURSE_5 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 6, 1, 0)) COURSE_6 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 7, 1, 0)) COURSE_7 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 8, 1, 0)) COURSE_8 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.RANK = 1 UNION ALL SELECT 3 SEQ ,'승률(%)' GBN ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 1, 1, 0))/B.CNT * 100, 1) COURSE_1 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 2, 1, 0))/B.CNT * 100, 1) COURSE_2 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 3, 1, 0))/B.CNT * 100, 1) COURSE_3 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 4, 1, 0))/B.CNT * 100, 1) COURSE_4 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 5, 1, 0))/B.CNT * 100, 1) COURSE_5 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 6, 1, 0))/B.CNT * 100, 1) COURSE_6 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 7, 1, 0))/B.CNT * 100, 1) COURSE_7 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 8, 1, 0))/B.CNT * 100, 1) COURSE_8 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A ,(SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND RANK = 1) B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.RANK = 1 GROUP BY B.CNT UNION ALL SELECT 4 SEQ , '전회차(1일 +2일)' GBN ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 1, 1, 0)) COURSE_1 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 2, 1, 0)) COURSE_2 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 3, 1, 0)) COURSE_3 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 4, 1, 0)) COURSE_4 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 5, 1, 0)) COURSE_5 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 6, 1, 0)) COURSE_6 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 7, 1, 0)) COURSE_7 ,SUM(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 8, 1, 0)) COURSE_8 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = TO_NUMBER(?) - 1 AND A.RANK = 1 ) ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT /* tbed_print_fd007 IWORK_SFR-008 3일차 까지... */ ROUND(AVG(A.STAR_TM), 2) TOT_AVG ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.DAY_ORD, 1,A.STAR_TM)), 2) DAY1_AVG ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.DAY_ORD, 2,A.STAR_TM)), 2) DAY2_AVG ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.DAY_ORD, 3,A.STAR_TM)), 2) DAY3_AVG ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(MOD(SUBSTR(GET_DEC(B.RES_NO), 7, 1), 2), 1, A.STAR_TM)), 2) MAN_AVG ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(MOD(SUBSTR(GET_DEC(B.RES_NO), 7, 1), 2), 0, A.STAR_TM)), 2) WOMAN_AVG FROM TBEB_ORGAN A ,TBEC_RACER_DETAIL B WHERE A.RACER_NO = B.RACER_NO AND A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.ST_MTHD_CD = '002' --플라잉스타트만 조회

SELECT /* tbed_print_fd008 IWORK_SFR-008 13기수 까지... */ ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO, 1, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_1 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO, 2, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_2 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO, 3, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_3 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO, 4, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_4 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO, 5, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_5 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO, 6, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_6 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO, 7, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_7 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO, 8, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_8 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO, 9, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_9 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO,10, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_10 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO,11, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_11 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO,12, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_12 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(B.RACER_PERIO_NO,13, A.STAR_TM)), 2) PERIO_13 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A ,TBEC_RACER_MASTER B WHERE A.RACER_NO = B.RACER_NO AND A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.ST_MTHD_CD = '002' --플라잉스타트만 조회

SELECT ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.RACER_GRD_CD, 'A1', A.STAR_TM)), 2) GRD_A1 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.RACER_GRD_CD, 'A2', A.STAR_TM)), 2) GRD_A2 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.RACER_GRD_CD, 'B1', A.STAR_TM)), 2) GRD_B1 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.RACER_GRD_CD, 'B2', A.STAR_TM)), 2) GRD_B2 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.ST_MTHD_CD = '002' --플라잉스타트만 조회

SELECT /* tbed_print_fd010 IWORK_SFR-008 3일차 까지... */ GBN ,COURSE_1 ,COURSE_2 ,COURSE_3 ,COURSE_4 ,COURSE_5 ,COURSE_6 ,COURSE_7 ,COURSE_8 FROM ( SELECT 1 SEQ ,'회차 평균 스타트타임' GBN ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 1, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_1 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 2, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_2 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 3, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_3 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 4, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_4 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 5, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_5 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 6, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_6 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 7, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_7 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 8, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_8 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.ST_MTHD_CD = '002' --플라잉스타트만 조회 GROUP BY A.TMS UNION ALL SELECT 2 SEQ ,'누적 평균 스타트타임' GBN ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 1, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_1 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 2, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_2 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 3, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_3 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 4, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_4 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 5, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_5 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 6, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_6 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 7, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_7 ,ROUND(AVG(DECODE(A.ENTRY_COURSE, 8, A.STAR_TM)), 2) COURSE_8 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.ST_MTHD_CD = '002' --플라잉스타트만 조회 GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR UNION ALL SELECT 3 SEQ ,'회차 출발위반' GBN ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 1, 1, 0)) COURSE_1 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 2, 1, 0)) COURSE_2 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 3, 1, 0)) COURSE_3 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 4, 1, 0)) COURSE_4 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 5, 1, 0)) COURSE_5 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 6, 1, 0)) COURSE_6 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 7, 1, 0)) COURSE_7 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 8, 1, 0)) COURSE_8 FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT A ,TBEB_ORGAN B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.RACE_REG_NO = B.RACE_REG_NO AND A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.VOIL_CD IN ('110','120') GROUP BY A.TMS UNION ALL SELECT 4 SEQ ,'출발위반누적' GBN ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 1, 1, 0)) COURSE_1 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 2, 1, 0)) COURSE_2 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 3, 1, 0)) COURSE_3 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 4, 1, 0)) COURSE_4 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 5, 1, 0)) COURSE_5 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 6, 1, 0)) COURSE_6 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 7, 1, 0)) COURSE_7 ,SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 8, 1, 0)) COURSE_8 FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT A ,TBEB_ORGAN B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.RACE_REG_NO = B.RACE_REG_NO AND A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.VOIL_CD IN ('110','120') GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR UNION ALL SELECT 5 SEQ ,'출발위반누적비율(%)' GBN ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 1, 1, 0))/C.CNT * 100, 2) COURSE_1 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 2, 1, 0))/C.CNT * 100, 2) COURSE_2 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 3, 1, 0))/C.CNT * 100, 2) COURSE_3 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 4, 1, 0))/C.CNT * 100, 2) COURSE_4 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 5, 1, 0))/C.CNT * 100, 2) COURSE_5 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 6, 1, 0))/C.CNT * 100, 2) COURSE_6 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 7, 1, 0))/C.CNT * 100, 2) COURSE_7 ,ROUND(SUM(DECODE(B.ENTRY_COURSE, 8, 1, 0))/C.CNT * 100, 2) COURSE_8 FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT A ,TBEB_ORGAN B ,(SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND VOIL_CD IN ('110','120')) C WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.RACE_REG_NO = B.RACE_REG_NO AND A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.VOIL_CD IN ('110','120') GROUP BY A.STND_YEAR, C.CNT ) ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT GBN ,FLYING_CNT ,CNT1 ,CNT2 ,CNT3 ,CNT4 ,CNT5 ,CNT6 ,CNT7 ,LATE_CNT ,NOT_CNT FROM ( SELECT 1 SEQ ,DAY_ORD||'일차' GBN ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '110', 1 , 0 )) FLYING_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT1 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT1 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT2 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT2 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT3 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT3 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT4 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT4 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT5 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT5 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT6 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT6 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT7 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT7 ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '120', 1 , 0 )) LATE_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '995', 1 , '996', 1 , '997', 1 , 0 )) NOT_CNT FROM (SELECT A.DAY_ORD DAY_ORD ,B.VOIL_CD VOIL_CD ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.09 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT1 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.1 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.19 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT2 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.2 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.29 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT3 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.3 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.39 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT4 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.4 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.49 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT5 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.5 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.99 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT6 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=1.0 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=1.50 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT7 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A, (SELECT * FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND VOIL_CD IN ('110','120','995','996','997') ) B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD(+) AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO(+) AND A.RACER_NO = B.RACER_NO(+) AND A.ST_MTHD_CD = '002' --플라잉스타트만 조회 ) A GROUP BY A.DAY_ORD UNION ALL SELECT 2 SEQ ,'계' GBN ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '110', 1 , 0 )) FLYING_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT1 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT1 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT2 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT2 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT3 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT3 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT4 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT4 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT5 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT5 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT6 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT6 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT7 , 0, 0 , 1 )) CNT7 ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '120', 1 , 0 )) LATE_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '995', 1 , '996', 1 , '997', 1 , 0 )) NOT_CNT FROM (SELECT B.VOIL_CD VOIL_CD ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.09 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT1 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.1 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.19 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT2 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.2 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.29 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT3 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.3 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.39 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT4 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.4 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.49 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT5 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.5 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.99 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT6 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=1.0 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=1.50 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL ) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT7 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A, (SELECT * FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND VOIL_CD IN ('110','120','995','996','997') ) B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD(+) AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO(+) AND A.RACER_NO = B.RACER_NO(+) AND A.ST_MTHD_CD = '002' --플라잉스타트만 조회 ) A UNION ALL SELECT A.SEQ ,A.GBN ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.FLYING_CNT / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) FLYING_CNT ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT1 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT1 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT2 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT2 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT3 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT3 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT4 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT4 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT5 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT5 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT6 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT6 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT7 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT7 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.LATE_CNT / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) LATE_CNT ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.NOT_CNT / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) NOT_CNT FROM (SELECT 3 SEQ ,'분포율(%)' GBN ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '110', 1 , 0 )) FLYING_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT1 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT1 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT2 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT2 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT3 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT3 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT4 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT4 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT5 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT5 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT6 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT6 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT7 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT7 ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '120', 1 , 0 )) LATE_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '995', 1 , '996', 1 , '997', 1 , 0 )) NOT_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT1 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT2 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT3 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT4 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT5 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT6 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT7 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '110', 1 , '120', 1 , '995', 1 , '996', 1 , '997', 1 , 0 )) SUM_CNT FROM (SELECT B.VOIL_CD VOIL_CD ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.09 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT1 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.1 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.19 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT2 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.2 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.29 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT3 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.3 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.39 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT4 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.4 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.49 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT5 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.5 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.99 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT6 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=1.0 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=1.50 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT7 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A, (SELECT * FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = ? AND VOIL_CD IN ('110','120','995','996','997') ) B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD(+) AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO(+) AND A.RACER_NO = B.RACER_NO(+) AND A.ST_MTHD_CD = '002' --플라잉스타트만 조회 )A )A UNION ALL SELECT A.SEQ ,A.GBN ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.FLYING_CNT / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) FLYING_CNT ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT1 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT1 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT2 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT2 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT3 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT3 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT4 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT4 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT5 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT5 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT6 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT6 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT7 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT7 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.LATE_CNT / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) LATE_CNT ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.NOT_CNT / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) NOT_CNT FROM (SELECT 4 SEQ ,'전회차 분포율(%)' GBN ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '110', 1 , 0 )) FLYING_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT1 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT1 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT2 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT2 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT3 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT3 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT4 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT4 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT5 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT5 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT6 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT6 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT7 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT7 ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '120', 1 , 0 )) LATE_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '995', 1 , '996', 1 , '997', 1 , 0 )) NOT_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT1 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT2 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT3 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT4 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT5 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT6 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT7 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '110', 1 , '120', 1 , '995', 1 , '996', 1 , '997', 1 , 0 )) SUM_CNT FROM (SELECT B.VOIL_CD VOIL_CD ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.09 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT1 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.1 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.19 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT2 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.2 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.29 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT3 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.3 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.39 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT4 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.4 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.49 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT5 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.5 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.99 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT6 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=1.0 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=1.50 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT7 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A, (SELECT * FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS = TO_NUMBER(?) -1 AND VOIL_CD IN ('110','120','995','996','997') ) B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = TO_NUMBER(?) -1 AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD(+) AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO(+) AND A.RACER_NO = B.RACER_NO(+) AND A.ST_MTHD_CD = '002' --플라잉스타트만 조회 )A ) A UNION ALL SELECT A.SEQ ,A.GBN ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.FLYING_CNT / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) FLYING_CNT ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT1 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT1 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT2 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT2 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT3 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT3 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT4 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT4 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT5 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT5 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT6 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT6 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.COUNT7 / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) CNT7 ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.LATE_CNT / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) LATE_CNT ,DECODE(SUM_CNT, 0, 0, ROUND((A.NOT_CNT / SUM_CNT) * 100, 2)) NOT_CNT FROM (SELECT 5 SEQ ,'누적평균(%)' GBN ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '110', 1 , 0 )) FLYING_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT1 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT1 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT2 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT2 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT3 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT3 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT4 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT4 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT5 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT5 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT6 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT6 ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT7 , 0, 0 , 1 )) COUNT7 ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '120', 1 , 0 )) LATE_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '995', 1 , '996', 1 , '997', 1 , 0 )) NOT_CNT ,SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT1 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT2 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT3 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT4 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT5 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT6 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.COUNT7 , 0, 0 , 1 )) +SUM(DECODE( A.VOIL_CD , '110', 1 , '120', 1 , '995', 1 , '996', 1 , '997', 1 , 0 )) SUM_CNT FROM (SELECT B.VOIL_CD VOIL_CD ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.09 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT1 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.1 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.19 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT2 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.2 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.29 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT3 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.3 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.39 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT4 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.4 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.49 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT5 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=0.5 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=0.99 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT6 ,CASE WHEN NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) >=1.0 AND NVL(A.STAR_TM,0) <=1.50 AND (A.STAR_TM IS NOT NULL) THEN STAR_TM ELSE 0 END COUNT7 FROM TBEB_ORGAN A, (SELECT * FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND VOIL_CD IN ('110','120','995','996','997') ) B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR(+) AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD(+) AND A.TMS = B.TMS(+) AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD(+) AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO(+) AND A.RACER_NO = B.RACER_NO(+) AND A.ST_MTHD_CD = '002' --플라잉스타트만 조회 )A ) A ) ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT ROWNUM SEQ ,A.DAY_ORD ,A.RACE_NO ,A.RACER_NO ,C.NM_KOR RACER_NM ,C.RACER_PERIO_NO ,C.RACER_GRD_CD ,D.CD_NM||' / '||B.WIND_SPD WEATHER FROM TBED_RACE_VOIL_ACT A ,TBEB_RACE B ,TBEC_RACER_MASTER C ,TBEA_SPEC_CD D WHERE B.WIND_DIRC_CD = D.CD AND D.GRP_CD = 'E00031' AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD AND A.RACE_NO = B.RACE_NO AND A.RACER_NO = C.RACER_NO AND A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.TMS = ? AND A.VOIL_CD IN ('110','120')
